In traditional Chinese folklore it is believed that every person must align with one of the five elements, those being: Water, Wood, Fire, Earth and Metal. It is time for you to determine your alignment.
I align with the Water Element.
I align with the Wood Element.
I align with the Fire Element.
I align with the Earth Element.
I align with the Metal Element.
